title: How to Be Popular: When you're a social reject like me, Steph L.
description: Steph Landry's been a high school pariah - and the butt of every joke imaginable - ever since she split her red Super Big Gulp all over It Girl Lauren Moffat's white D&G mini-skirt. But now Steph's got a secret weapon - an ancient book, 'How To Be Popular'.
author: Meg Cabot
